channel.title: No update for Black Mesa (steam edition)
channel.description: Hello everyone! Can somebody tell me why there is no update for Black Mesa? I saw the news on steam that there is a major update fix for Black Mesa, but i didn't get one. Content Update 0.1.0 and Fix for Issues with Latest Patch (Content Update 0.1.0). :slight_smile:

item.title: No update for Black Mesa (steam edition)
item.dc:creator: Rex117
item.description:
Raziel_ZV:
Rex117:

Hello everyone! Can somebody tell me why there is no update for Black Mesa? I saw the news on steam that there is a major update fix for Black Mesa, but i didn’t get one. Content Update 0.1.0 and Fix for Issues with Latest Patch (Content Update 0.1.0).

But there is … it downloads automaticly when you log in to your steam account … if that’s what you mean …

Yes, i know . But the problem is it downloaded the update with the zombie hands glitch in SP. When i saw the news about a new patch witch is this one: Fix for Issues with Latest Patch (Content Update 0.1.0), I did not get this new update. Sorry if my English is bad .

Read full topic
item.source: No update for Black Mesa (steam edition)
